== Nonavinakere (612144) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Nonavinakere is a village in the [[Tiptur ]] taluka of [[Tumkur]] district with an area of 845.93 hectares and harbouring 1153 households with total population of 4631 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Tiptur]] is at a distance of 14 km. Male population is 2352 and female population is 2279. Scheduled Caste Population is 365 and Scheduled Tribes population is 313. Census Location Code of the village is 612144<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 3594 (77.61%)
* Literate male population: 1905 (80.99%)
* Literate female population: 1689 (74.11%)
